data.question: What is the chemical formula of the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer mentioned?
What method was used for the synthesis of the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer?
What are the catalytic activities of the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer?
data.answer: Three-component Strecker reactions and visible-light driven degradation of organic dyes

data.question: What is the turnover frequency (TOF) of the catalyst in the Strecker reaction using benzaldehyde?
Is the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer stable in air?
Can the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer be reused without significant loss of catalytic activity?
Does the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer show higher catalytic activity than CuII and [CuII(SalHImCy)](NO3)2 under similar conditions?
What is the effect of changing the reaction temperature on the catalytic activities of the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer in the Strecker reaction?
data.answer: Temperature changes did not significantly affect the catalytic activities in terms of percentage conversion and diastereoselectivity.

data.question: What role do the CuII–Im moieties of the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer play in the Strecker reaction?
data.answer: Function as Brønsted bases to activate the cyanides

data.question: What percentage of methylene blue can be decomposed under visible-light illumination using the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer?
Is the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer insoluble in common organic solvents?
Does the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer contain a single CUS?
What is the role of CuII ions in the degradation of organic dyes?
data.answer: CuII ions play a major catalytic role in various oxidation reactions.

data.question: What is the crystal system of the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer?
What is the space group of the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer?
Does the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer demonstrate high photocatalytic efficiency in degrading rhodamine B and methyl orange?
What is the yield percentage of the Strecker reaction using 4-phenyl as a substrate at 298 K?
Can the structural features of the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer be determined by single-crystal X-ray diffraction analysis?
What is the role of CuII ions in the Strecker reaction catalyzed by the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer?
data.answer: Act as Lewis acids to activate the imine intermediates

data.question: Does the copper(I)/copper(II)–salen coordination polymer retain its photocatalytic efficiency after three cycles of photocatalytic degradation of methylene blue?
